sources.title: We're in the Legion Now!
sources.description: From IMDb - Two petty gangsters trying to elude their enemies join the French Foreign Legion.

sources.title: We're in the Legion Now (1936) MAGNACOLOR
sources.description:
FIRST TIME ON YOUTUBE in ORIGINAL MAGNACOLOR
Director: Crane Wilbur
Stars: Reginald Denny, Vince Barnett, Claudia Dell, Eleanor Hunt

An unlikely pair of underworld characters attempt to elude arrest and their deadly rivals by joining the French Foreign Legion.

Trivia: MagnaColor is a 2-strip color film process similar to CineColor.Â It was developed by early Moving Pictures entrepreneur, George A. Hirliman, best remembered as the producer of the Campy Classic REEFER MADNESS.

sources.title: We're in the Legion Now (1936) COMEDY
sources.description:
Stars: Reginald Denny, Esther Ralston, Claudia Dell
 Director: Crane Wilbur

 Two petty gangsters trying to elude their enemies join the French Foreign Legion.
